subject: Re: [junit] Did my question get missed, somehow?
msgSnippet: ... Just so you know, I didn t respond because I didn t follow it. I don t do a lot of multithreaded programming, so I didn t feel I could contribute to your
messageBody:
cypherfox wrote:

> Greetings,
> I asked about a few feature enhancements, or more accurately if
> anyone had any reasons they shouldn't be done, or what testing
> paradigm I might be missing that made them wrong... It was in
> this message:
>
> http://groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/message/11398
>
> I'll just ask this second time, because it seems like there was a lot
> of fast posting going on right them, so maybe it got missed.
>
> Any help, pointers, or disagreements would be greatly appreciated.

Just so you know, I didn't respond because I didn't follow it. I don't
do a lot of multithreaded programming, so I didn't feel I could
contribute to your question.

As for patching JUnit, that's not likely to happen. Is there a generic
extension you'd like to contribute to the community?
